channel.title: FusionScape (incomplete) 317
channel.description:
[b]My first server to be online, enjoy :)[/b]
[size=25pt]Please post If you downloaded![/size]
[size=24pt]o.0 1000 VIEWS!!![/size] 75% complete. And yes, the crown is horrible. Just replace the sprite.
[size=14pt]So i'm releasing my server as I have gave up this server and started 562's so I might as well give this to you. You may leach IF you fix the glitches and stuff. Any questions or concerns, P.M me. I'm not expecting you to all enjoy this but this for the people that do.[/size]
[size=14pt]Some glitches; "EMPT" tele box leads to staff room :P "edge" tele box leads to pkbox "torn" tele box leads to kbd "pkbox" doesn't lead anywhere You can't wear any items if your levels are higher than 99 (max level is 125) You can't eat if your not equipped with a weapon[/size]
#Credits Credits Credits look at all these Credits Me - 20% (for changing lots of stuff including home shops ETC..) Allstar - 35% (base) Moparscape tuts - 15% (how to make models, add models ETC..) My wonderful beta testers ;) - 15% (for telling me what should change to keep the server long lasting and stuff) Wilddreams - 15% for Client
Media
This is the server control panel in case you didn't know.. [img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/9625/78943168.jpg[/img]

Jad (sorry it is not in the right spot) [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/5143/evolved0046.png[/img]
GS mini [img]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/2189/evolved0047.png[/img]
KBD (sorry it is not in the right spot) [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/4066/evolved0048.png[/img]

Client - http://www.mediafire.com/?73olu8aaoit7k7g (27mb)
Source - http://www.mediafire.com/?65gowj80ra0mon6 (3mb)
Package (client + source) - http://www.mediafire.com/?dsfk40b0ok907ee (30mb)

item.title: FusionScape (incomplete) 317
item.dc:creator: @FuZzIoN FuZzIoN
item.description:
@FuZzIoN wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:33, topic:410230”][quote author=FuZzIoN link=topic=511513.msg3724594#msg3724594 date=1314168739]

Why 20% to you for changing home?

You can’t wear any items if your levels are higher than 99 (max level is 125)

Nice!!! L2code.

Sir you have reading difficulties. I suggest Specsavers as they do a good deal with reading glasses.

First of all I said this was INCOMPLETE and this is my first release. I asked for help if anyone knows how to fix and no-one helped me.
I can code actually in other various programs but Java’s new to me. Download it yourself and see what iv’e done.

remove HP bar back to old, HP (x/x) remove

And add better looking models, it’ll be 10x better

Yeah I know this was already built in to the client. I checked in the sprites folder (gameframes and all that) and I couldn’t find the HP bar. So this might of been generated in the code. But ill try my best
[/quote]
Why would i download this? It’s a waste of space. You changed absolutely nothing. Why call this a release? Like Mendo said, fix it up.[/quote]
Don’t download then
Keep your opinion to yourself.
You should know that young sir.

[quote=“john5689, post:26, topic:410230”]The server is good, but just give me like most of the credits cuse all you did was change the home and that’s pratically it…

Edit:

Have a look at when you downloaded from and compare it to this

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384355.0.html[/quote]

What is wrong with your client. I can’t log on

Read full topic

item.title: FusionScape (incomplete) 317
item.dc:creator: @FuZzIoN FuZzIoN
item.description:
@FuZzIoN wrote:

kya219:

This is awesome, how do you become a mod??? i put my name in the list and nothing

goto character folder and click on your in-game name. where it says “character-rights = 0” change the “0” into 3 to be owner, 2 to be admin or 1 to be mod.

Read full topic
